tasks.title: Define technical event goals and format
tasks.description: Clarify the purpose (networking, training, product launch), target audience, event type (workshop, meetup, conference), and success metrics.

tasks.title: Set budget and secure venue/date
tasks.description: Estimate costs (venue, AV, catering, speakers, swag) and confirm the event date, time, and venue (or virtual platform).

tasks.title: Build agenda and recruit speakers
tasks.description: Draft session topics, timing, and breaks; invite speakers/panelists; confirm talk titles, bios, and requirements.

tasks.title: Arrange logistics and technical setup
tasks.description: Plan AV/internet, microphones, recording/streaming, registration/check-in, signage, accessibility, and run-of-show responsibilities.

tasks.title: Create registration and promotion plan
tasks.description: Set up event page and ticketing/RSVP, write promo copy, schedule announcements, and coordinate with partners/communities.

tasks.title: Finalize vendors and attendee communications
tasks.description: Confirm catering/vendors, send attendee emails (schedule, location, parking/links, code of conduct), and prepare materials/slides template.

tasks.title: Run event day checklist and post-event follow-up
tasks.description: Execute run-of-show, manage issues, collect feedback, share recordings/slides, thank speakers/sponsors, and document learnings.
